Endpoint: /teemboom_comments

Method: POST Description: Retrieves webpage comments by page_id.

Request

Body:

{
    "page_id": "string",
    "filter": "oldest|newest|relevance|top",  
    "range": "list|Array",
}

Response

Success:

{
    "status": True, 
    "data": {
        "comments_no": "int", 
        "comments": "list"
    }
}

Failure:

{
    "status": False, 
    "message": "string"
}
